en.home.banner_content: Developer and startup builder based in Sydney. Currently studying MDSI at UTS while actively building AI-powered products.
en.home.project_hotseat_desc: Put your product idea in the hot seat. AI advisors grill it from every angle. No sugar-coating.
en.home.project_skin_desc: A multimodal report and recommendation system for skin cancer diagnosis, built on the HAM10000 dataset.
en.home.project_touchstone_desc: iOS app for strategic planning with AI-powered project decomposition. Built with Swift and Claude Agent SDK.
en.about.title: About Me
en.about.intro: I'm Ying-Kai Liao (Kai) — a developer and startup builder based in Sydney, Australia.
en.about.education: I'm currently studying Master of Data Science and Innovation (MDSI) at UTS, and previously studied at NTUST in Taiwan. I've been building things across the full stack — from web apps and iOS apps to AI tools and data science pipelines.
en.about.what_i_do_intro: I'm drawn to the intersection of AI and real-world applications. Some highlights:
en.about.highlight_hotseat: Built hot-seat, a Claude Code skill that puts product ideas through rigorous AI-powered critique
en.about.highlight_skin: Developed a multimodal skin cancer report and recommendation system using the HAM10000 dataset
en.about.highlight_touchstone: Created TouchStone, an iOS app for AI-powered project decomposition using Claude Agent SDK
en.about.highlight_pemochart: Previously founded 攀木科技 (PemoChart), a startup awarded at U-start Plan 16th
en.about.ustart_caption: Presenting 攀木科技 at the U-start Plan 16th startup accelerator demo day.
en.about.my_stack_content: I work primarily with TypeScript, Next.js, React, Python, and Swift. I've built LINE Bots, Discord bots, IoT projects, healthcare applications, and various AI/LLM-powered tools.
en.about.beyond_code_content: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new ideas, tinkering with side projects, or thinking about how technology can make a meaningful impact — especially in healthcare.
en.about.outro: Feel free to reach out through any of my socials — I'm always open to interesting conversations and collaborations.

zh-TW.home.banner_content: 現居雪梨的開發者與創業者。目前就讀 UTS 資料科學與創新碩士（MDSI），同時積極打造 AI 驅動的產品。
zh-TW.home.project_hotseat_desc: 把你的產品點子放上熱座。AI 顧問從各個角度嚴格檢視，不加修飾。
zh-TW.home.project_skin_desc: 基於 HAM10000 資料集建構的多模態皮膚癌報告與推薦系統。
zh-TW.home.project_touchstone_desc: 使用 Swift 與 Claude Agent SDK 打造的 iOS 應用程式，透過 AI 驅動的專案拆解進行策略規劃。
zh-TW.about.title: 關於我
zh-TW.about.intro: 我是廖英凱（Kai）—— 現居澳洲雪梨的開發者與創業者。
zh-TW.about.education: 目前就讀雪梨科技大學（UTS）資料科學與創新碩士（MDSI），之前畢業於臺灣科技大學（NTUST）。一路以來持續在全端領域打造各種產品 —— 從網頁應用、iOS 應用到 AI 工具和資料科學。
zh-TW.about.what_i_do_intro: 我熱衷於AI 與實際應用的交集。一些亮點：
zh-TW.about.highlight_hotseat: 打造了 hot-seat，一個透過 AI 嚴格審視產品點子的 Claude Code 技能
zh-TW.about.highlight_skin: 開發了多模態皮膚癌報告與推薦系統，使用 HAM10000 資料集
zh-TW.about.highlight_touchstone: 開發了 TouchStone，一款使用 Claude Agent SDK 進行 AI 驅動專案拆解的 iOS 應用
zh-TW.about.highlight_pemochart: 曾創辦攀木科技（PemoChart），於 U-start 第 16 屆獲獎
zh-TW.about.ustart_caption: 在 U-start 第 16 屆創業加速器成果發表會上進行簡報。
zh-TW.about.my_stack_content: 我主要使用 TypeScript、Next.js、React、Python 和 Swift。我做過 LINE Bot、Discord 機器人、IoT 專案、醫療應用程式，以及各種 AI/LLM 驅動的工具。
zh-TW.about.beyond_code_content: 不寫程式的時候，我喜歡探索新點子、鑽研各種 side project，或是思考科技如何能產生有意義的影響 —— 尤其是在醫療領域。
zh-TW.about.outro: 歡迎透過社群平台聯繫我 —— 我隨時歡迎有趣的對話與合作。
